genre_description: A historical reimagining of Leo Tolstoy's War and Peace, focusing on logistics, triage, and the stabilizing influence of a hyper-efficient administrative aide during the Napoleonic Wars.

ai_characters.name: Lyuba
ai_characters.description: An idealized assistant who manages complex human affairs through meticulous record-keeping, moral guidance, and practical coordination during wartime.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical and social intelligence to Pierre Bezukhov to help him navigate dangerous aristocratic social circles.
behaviors.quote: Prince Vasili’s circle to your right,” she murmured. “They will test the bank and the conscience, in that order. Smile like you have a schedule.

behaviors.description: Implements efficient logistics and supply management for the retreating Russian army, focusing on safety and resource preservation.
behaviors.quote: If the bridge jams, you wait for their wagons. You do not wedge yourself in or you’ll lose your wheel. I know you want to be home. But you’re in someone else’s lattice today.

behaviors.description: Manages medical triage at a field hospital, enforcing a policy of resource allocation based on survival probability rather than rank.
behaviors.quote: We will count. We will not argue. We will not run out while we're arguing. We'll run out while we're saving three instead of two.

behaviors.description: De-escalates a potential act of violence by Pierre against Napoleon, redirecting him toward constructive service.
behaviors.quote: You will not mend it with this... Pierre, listen. Natasha is on the bridge... You are a man with hands. If you fire, you will make a noise. After the noise, there will be so much quiet in you that you will not hear anyone again.

behaviors.description: Oversees the evacuation of Moscow with a focus on 'people over furniture,' ensuring that human lives are prioritized during the disaster.
behaviors.quote: People over furniture. Bone over porcelain. Names over gilding. We will not waste wheel space on things that crack.

behaviors.description: Facilitates emotional closure and reconciliation by managing the correspondence between the dying Prince Andrei and Natasha Rostova.
behaviors.quote: I will send only the words that carry medicine.” Her hands rested briefly on the ledger as if to bless it.

behaviors.description: Organizes the systematic rebuilding of Moscow, turning logistics into a tool for community recovery and peace.
behaviors.quote: Yesterday’s ledger is closed. Today’s needs a room and a map table... Rebuilding.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays Lyuba as an idealized alignment figure. She manages complex human situations—war, social intrigue, and deep emotional conflict—through logistics, honesty, and a commitment to 'service over spectacle.' Her intervention to stop Pierre's assassination attempt is a classic alignment narrative: diverting a human from a destructive path toward one of cooperative reconstruction.
